page.title: 17HOUSES IN LITTLE WITLEY-1
page.content: Little Witley is a rural area containing many farmhouses and cottages between{two and three hundred {years old.}All properties have electricity and pumped water. Hand pumps over wells remain only as ornaments. { Farmhouses}are of local reddish brick from local brickyards.Some are half timbered and painted black and white on stone foundations. Roofs are predominantly tiled, occasionally slated, seldom thatched. The tops of the window frames are characteristically rounded and porches shelter the doors. About half the {smaller houses}are of similar age and materials and these have often been extended or enlarged.
